ai-thag19.1:1.1_0: Oh, when will I stay in a mountain cave,
ai-thag19.1:1.3_0: discerning all states of existence as impermanent?
ai-thag19.1:1.4_0: This hope of mine, when will it be?
ai-thag19.1:2.1_0: Oh, when will I stay happily in the forest,
ai-thag19.1:2.2_0: a sage wearing a torn robe, dressed in ocher,
ai-thag19.1:2.3_0: unselfish, with no need for hope,
ai-thag19.1:2.4_0: with greed, hate, and delusion destroyed?
ai-thag19.1:3.1_0: Oh, when will I say that disease,
ai-thag19.1:3.2_0: the body is terrified, swept away, and range.
ai-thag19.1:3.3_0: a nest of death and disease,
ai-thag19.1:3.4_0: oppressed by death and old age; when will it be?
ai-thag19.1:4.1_0: Oh, when will I live, having grasped the sharp sword of wisdom
ai-thag19.1:4.2_0: and cut the creeper of craving that tangles around everything,
ai-thag19.1:4.3_0: she took hold of wisdom and made a matchmaker
ai-thag19.1:5.1_0: Oh, when will I, seated on the lion’s throne,
ai-thag19.1:5.2_0: swiftly grasp the sword of the sages,
ai-thag19.1:5.3_0: forged by wisdom, of fiery might,
ai-thag19.1:5.4_0: and swiftly break Māra and his army? When will it be?
ai-thag19.1:6.1_0: Oh, when will I be seen striving in the assemblies
ai-thag19.1:6.2_0: by those who are virtuous, poised, respecting the Dhamma,
ai-thag19.1:6.3_0: seeing things as they are, with faculties subdued?
ai-thag19.1:7.1_0: Oh, when will I eat the stones
ai-thag19.1:7.2_0: free of oppression by laziness, hunger, thirst,
ai-thag19.1:8.1_0: Oh, when will I, serene and mindful,
ai-thag19.1:8.3_0: that were realized by the great hermit,
ai-thag19.1:8.4_0: and are so very hard to see? When will it be?
ai-thag19.1:9.1_0: Oh, when will I, having seen sounds,
ai-thag19.1:9.2_0: see with understanding the infinite sights,
ai-thag19.1:9.3_0: sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and thoughts
ai-thag19.1:9.4_0: as burning? When will it be?
ai-thag19.1:10.1_0: Oh, when will I not be downcast
ai-thag19.1:10.2_0: through that there will be no sign,
ai-thag19.1:10.3_0: and sometimes even in some signs.
ai-thag19.1:11.1_0: Oh, when will I live on grass
ai-thag19.1:11.2_0: and the infinite varieties of phenomena,
ai-thag19.1:11.3_0: that is neither internally nor external.
ai-thag19.1:11.4_0: wood, grass, and creepers? When will it be?
ai-thag19.1:12.1_0: Oh, when will the rain clouds in season
ai-thag19.1:12.2_0: freshly wet me in my robe in the forest,
ai-thag19.1:12.3_0: walking the path trodden by the sages?
ai-thag19.1:13.3_0: having risen and fall, after making the deathless attainment of the deathless,
ai-thag19.1:13.4_0: When would you think, ‘When will it be?
ai-thag19.1:14.1_0: Oh, when will I cross the Ganges, Yamunā,
ai-thag19.1:14.2_0: and Sarasvatī rivers, the Pātāla country,
ai-thag19.1:14.4_0: by psychic power unimpeded? When will it be?
ai-thag19.1:15.1_0: Oh, when will I stay in the forest,
ai-thag19.1:15.2_0: rejecting entirely the signs of beauty,
ai-thag19.1:15.3_0: splitting apart desire for sensual stimulation,
ai-thag19.1:15.4_0: like an elephant that wanders free of ties? When will it be?
ai-thag19.1:16.1_0: Oh, when will I realize the teaching of the great hermit
ai-thag19.1:16.2_0: and be content, like a poor person in debt,
ai-thag19.1:16.3_0: you will be content at the scriptures.
ai-thag19.1:17.1_0: For many years you begged me,
ai-thag19.1:17.2_0: “Enough of living in a house for you!”
ai-thag19.1:17.3_0: Why do you not urge me on, mind,
ai-thag19.1:17.4_0: now that I’ve gone forth as an ascetic?
ai-thag19.1:18.2_0: “On the Mountainfold, the birds with colorful wings,
ai-thag19.1:18.4_0: they’ll delight you as you meditate in the forest.
ai-thag19.1:19.1_0: 'In my family circle, friends, loved ones, and relatives;
ai-thag19.1:19.2_0: and the pleasures of the senses.
ai-thag19.1:19.3_0: all these I gave up when I entered this life:
ai-thag19.1:19.4_0: That which you did not, mind,
ai-thag19.1:20.1_0: This is mine alone, it doesn’t belong to others;
ai-thag19.1:20.2_0: when it is time to don your armor, why lament?
ai-thag19.1:20.3_0: Reflecting that all this is unstable,
ai-thag19.1:20.4_0: I went forth, longing for the deathless state.
ai-thag19.1:21.1_0: He who was supreme in tam and trained,
ai-thag19.1:21.2_0: great physician, guide for those who wish to train, said:
ai-thag19.1:21.4_0: without passion, with nothing to defeat.’
ai-thag19.1:22.1_0: Sensual pleasures are diverse, sweet, delightful;
ai-thag19.1:22.2_0: an ignorant ordinary person is bound to them.
ai-thag19.1:22.3_0: Seeking to be reborn again, they wish for suffering;
ai-thag19.1:22.4_0: led on by their mind, they’re relegated to hell.
ai-thag19.1:23.1_0: “Staying in the grove resounding with cries
ai-thag19.1:23.2_0: of peacocks and herons, and honored by leopards and tigers,
ai-thag19.1:23.3_0: abandon concern for the body, without fail!”
ai-thag19.1:23.4_0: So you used to urge me, mind.
ai-thag19.1:24.2_0: the powers, awakening factors, and immersion;
ai-thag19.1:24.3_0: realize the three knowledges in the teaching of the Buddha!”
ai-thag19.1:24.4_0: So you used to urge me, mind.
ai-thag19.1:25.1_0: “Develop the path to realize the deathless!
ai-thag19.1:25.2_0: emancipating, plunging into the end of all suffering,
ai-thag19.1:25.4_0: So you used to urge me, mind.
ai-thag19.1:26.1_0: “Reflect properly on the aggregates as suffering,
ai-thag19.1:26.2_0: and abandon that from which suffering arises;
ai-thag19.1:26.3_0: make an end of suffering in this very life!”
ai-thag19.1:26.4_0: So you used to urge me, mind.
ai-thag19.1:27.2_0: that emptiness is non-self, and that misery is death.
ai-thag19.1:27.4_0: So you used to urge me, mind.
ai-thag19.1:28.2_0: (Whoever) will set out from Kapilavatthu and families
ai-thag19.1:28.3_0: Devote yourself to the word of the teacher, the great hermit!”
ai-thag19.1:28.4_0: So you used to urge me, mind.
ai-thag19.1:29.2_0: unattached to families and sensual pleasures,
ai-thag19.1:29.3_0: like the full moon on a bright night!”
ai-thag19.1:29.4_0: So you used to urge me, mind.
ai-thag19.1:30.2_0: one who lives in charnel grounds, a rag-robe wearer,
ai-thag19.1:30.3_0: one who never lies down, always delighting in ascetic practices.”
ai-thag19.1:30.4_0: So you used to urge me, mind.
ai-thag19.1:31.1_0: Mind, when you urge me to the impermanent and unstable,
ai-thag19.1:31.2_0: you’re acting like someone who plants trees,
ai-thag19.1:31.3_0: then, when they’re about to fruit,
ai-thag19.1:31.4_0: wishes to cut down the very same trees.
ai-thag19.1:32.2_0: I won’t do your bidding any more.
ai-thag19.1:32.3_0: Sensual pleasures are suffering, painful, and very dangerous;
ai-thag19.1:32.4_0: I’ll wander with my mind focused only on quenching.
ai-thag19.1:33.1_0: I didn’t go forth due to bad luck or shamelessness,
ai-thag19.1:33.2_0: or due to a whim or banishment,
ai-thag19.1:33.3_0: nor for the sake of a livelihood;
ai-thag19.1:33.4_0: it was because I agreed to the promise you made, mind.
ai-thag19.1:34.2_0: the stilling of suffering: these are praised by good people.”
ai-thag19.1:34.3_0: So you used to urge me, mind,
ai-thag19.1:34.4_0: but now you keep on with your old habits!
ai-thag19.1:35.1_0: Craving, ignorance, the loved and unloved,
ai-thag19.1:35.3_0: and the delightful kinds of sensual stimulation:
ai-thag19.1:35.4_0: I’ve vomited them all, and I won’t swallow them back.
ai-thag19.1:36.1_0: I’ve done your bidding everywhere, mind!
ai-thag19.1:36.2_0: And who are in many things -
ai-thag19.1:36.3_0: yet this self-made chain is your show of gratitude!
ai-thag19.1:36.4_0: For a long time I’ve transmigrated in the suffering you’ve created.
ai-thag19.1:37.1_0: Only you, mind, make a brahmin;
ai-thag19.1:37.2_0: You’re an aristocrat, and you have the aristocrat king.
ai-thag19.1:37.3_0: Sometimes we become traders or workers;
ai-thag19.1:37.4_0: and life as a god is also on account of you.
ai-thag19.1:38.4_0: and life as a ghost is also on account of you.
ai-thag19.1:39.1_0: Come what may, you won’t betray me again,
ai-thag19.1:39.2_0: gave the moment, then (him) is a reward.
ai-thag19.1:39.3_0: You play with me like I’m mad—
ai-thag19.1:39.4_0: but how have I ever failed you, mind?
ai-thag19.1:40.4_0: as a trainer with a hook guides a rutting elephant.
ai-thag19.1:41.1_0: The teacher willed that this world appear to me
ai-thag19.1:41.3_0: Mind, let me leap into the victor’s teaching,
ai-thag19.1:41.4_0: carry me over the great flood, so hard to pass.
ai-thag19.1:42.2_0: Nothing could make me return to your control!
ai-thag19.1:42.3_0: I’ve gone forth in the teaching of the great hermit,
ai-thag19.1:42.4_0: those like me don’t come to ruin.
ai-thag19.1:43.2_0: the four directions, the intermediate directions, below and in the sky;
ai-thag19.1:43.3_0: the three realms of existence are all impermanent and troubled—
ai-thag19.1:43.4_0: where can you go to find happiness, mind?
ai-thag19.1:44.1_0: Mind, what will you do to someone who has made the ultimate commitment?
ai-thag19.1:44.2_0: (But) your mind is not enough amongst those who wish for,
ai-thag19.1:44.3_0: there’s no way I’d touch a bellows with a mouth open at each end;
ai-thag19.1:44.4_0: curse this mortal frame flowing with nine streams!
ai-thag19.1:45.1_0: You’ve ascended the mountain peak, full of nature’s beauty,
ai-thag19.1:45.4_0: and there you’ll be happy in your cave-home.
ai-thag19.1:46.1_0: Peacocks with beautiful necks and crests,
ai-thag19.1:46.3_0: crying out at the resounding thunder:
ai-thag19.1:46.4_0: they’ll delight you as you meditate in the forest.
ai-thag19.1:47.1_0: When the sky has rained down, and the grass is four inches high,
ai-thag19.1:47.2_0: and the grove is full of flowers like a cloud,
ai-thag19.1:47.3_0: in the mountain cleft, like the fork of a tree, I’ll lie;
ai-thag19.1:47.4_0: it will be as soft as cotton-buds.
ai-thag19.1:48.1_0: Like that I will be an old blazing,
ai-thag19.1:48.2_0: let whatever I get be enough for me.
ai-thag19.1:48.3_0: And that’s why I’ll make you as supple
ai-thag19.1:48.4_0: like a catskin beast so well-ruffled.
ai-thag19.1:49.1_0: Like that I will be an old blazing,
ai-thag19.1:49.2_0: let whatever I get be enough for me.
ai-thag19.1:49.3_0: I’ll control you with my energy,
ai-thag19.1:49.4_0: as a skilled trainer controls an elephant with a hook.
ai-thag19.1:50.1_0: Now that you’re well-tamed and reliable,
ai-thag19.1:50.2_0: I can use you, like a trainer uses a straight-running horse,
ai-thag19.1:50.3_0: to practice the path so full of grace,
ai-thag19.1:50.4_0: cultivated by those who take care of their minds.
ai-thag19.1:51.1_0: I shall strongly fasten you to a meditation subject,
ai-thag19.1:51.2_0: like an elephant in a strong post.
ai-thag19.1:51.3_0: You’ll be well-guarded by me, well-developed by mindfulness,
ai-thag19.1:51.4_0: will be no more than all bonds
ai-thag19.1:52.1_0: You’ll use understanding to cut the follower of the wrong path,
ai-thag19.1:52.2_0: Whoever goes on the path through an unjust,
ai-thag19.1:52.3_0: And when you have seen the cause of suffering arise and pass away,
ai-thag19.1:52.4_0: He was the heir to say,
ai-thag19.1:53.1_0: Under the sway of the four distortions, mind,
ai-thag19.1:53.2_0: plunged me in the Round Hall,
ai-thag19.1:53.3_0: but now you won’t associate with the great sage of compassion,
ai-thag19.1:53.4_0: the cutter of fetters and bonds?
ai-thag19.1:54.1_0: Like a deer in a fancy chariot,
ai-thag19.1:54.2_0: I’ll ascend the lovely mountain wreathed in cloud,
ai-thag19.1:54.3_0: and rejoice to be on that hill, free of folk—
ai-thag19.1:54.4_0: there is no doubt you’ll perish, mind.
ai-thag19.1:55.1_0: The men and women who live under your will and command,
ai-thag19.1:55.3_0: they are ignorant and fall under Māra’s control;
ai-thag19.1:55.4_0: loving life, they’re your disciples, mind.
ai-thag19.1:55.7_0: The Book of wisdom is finished.
ai-thag19.1:56.0_0: Then they pass away from that host of gods
ai-thag19.1:56.3_0: Herein, wisdom is the verse of wisdom.
